org.itemscript.schema
Class Schema

java.lang.Object
  org.itemscript.schema.Schema
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasSystem
public class Schema
extends java.lang.Object
implements HasSystem

Provides access to the Schema functions of Itemscript.

Author:
Jacob Davies
jacob@itemscript.org
